description.original: Adds ability to link with @ (the At Symbol) in Obsidian. Can limit @ linking to specific folders e.g. People/
description.translation: 在Obsidian中增加了连接@ 的能力。是否可以限制@链接到特定文件夹，例如People/

dict.Notice(`Trigger symbol must be a single: Notice(`触发符号必须为单个字符。`)
dict.Notice(`Invalid regex or flags`): Notice(`无效的正则表达式或标志`)
dict.Notice(\n `Unable to create new n:
Notice(
        `无法在路径上创建新注释: ${(_e = value.obj)
dict..log(\n \"@ Symbol Linking: E:
.log(
            "@Symbol Linking：创建首个链接时出错",
            error

dict.text: \"If no folders are added, links w: text: "如果未添加任何文件夹，链接将从所有文件夹中获取。"
dict.text: \"May be slower than the native po: text: "可能比原生弹出窗口慢。"
dict.text: \"When set above 0, you'll need to: text: "当设置大于0时，需按下ESC键、回车键或输入超过X个空格才能关闭弹窗。"
dict..setName(\"Leave popup open for X spaces: .setName("弹出窗口保持开启 X 个空格")
dict..setName(\"Remove accents from search qu: .setName("去除搜索查询中的重音符号")
